actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 5 of title 5, United States Code, relating to administrative procedure, to provide for the consideration of petitions for the issuance, amendment, or repeal of an agency rule within a fixed time.

summary.text: Requires Federal agencies, upon receiving from an interested person a petition for the issuance, amendment, or appeal of a rule, to either deny such petition or initiate the requested rulemaking within 60 days.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 5 of title 5, United States Code, relating to administrative procedure, to provide for the consideration of petitions for the issuance, amendment, or repeal of an agency rule within a fixed time.
